title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project—CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and serving large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; installable from PyPI as `ollama`. Provides sync/async APIs and streaming chat completions.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; published on npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models; available on PyPI inside `langchain-community`.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Popular open-source web UI (now renamed “Open WebUI”) that connects to local Ollama instances; features chat history, model management, and RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI tool that wraps Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo demonstrating function-calling support in Ollama via JSON schema and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Postgres for chat history, and Nginx for TLS.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or query your vault using local models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official Ollama JS client; 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official Python client; 100k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit dedicated to Ollama ecosystem discussions, model recommendations, and troubleshooting.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News thread announcing Ollama v0.1.20 with concurrent model loading and multi-GPU support.
